text: If any part of their carcasses falls on any sort of grain that is to be sown, it remains clean;
Then she said to her father, “Let me have this favor. Do nothing for two months, that I and my companions may go wander in the mountains to weep for my virginity.”
You I will take and you shall reign over all that you desire and shall become king of Israel.

See to it, therefore, that a copy of these instructions be made and given to Jonathan. Let it be displayed on the holy mountain in a conspicuous place.'”
Make haste, then, to send us those who can inform us of your preference.
After he had spoken, a Pharisee invited him to dine at his home. He entered and reclined at table to eat.
But some of them said, “Could not the one who opened the eyes of the blind man have done something so that this man would not have died?”
They were stoned, sawed in two, put to death at sword's point; they went about in skins of sheep or goats, needy, afflicted, tormented.
